text: Maxi (マキシ, Makishi, also written as 真喜志) is a character in the Soul Calibur series of fighting games. The Nunchaku is his primary weapon in the games. He was a wandering pirate from Shuri in the Ryūkyū Kingdom (present-day Okinawa, Japan). biography Category:Video game characters Maxi en:Maxi (Soulcalibur)
title: Maxi
